main event: On 3 Sep 55, a cigar-shaped UFO of reddish-orange color was observed moving slowly in a 30-degree arc across the sky near the Big Dipper in Bellingham, Washington.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes,The object appeared to respond to lighting conditions, intensifying when it moved and dimming when still,The source was a reliable grocery store clerk observed as sober and cooperative,The investigation concluded that the object could not be positively identified,The report included commentary on the lack of available data for proper analysis.
witness description: Mr. Charles Saunders, Grocery Store Clerk
